name: gulp-sass-starter-kit-master
description: A basic Gulpfile kit that I created and use to facilitate my learning of SASS and Advanced CSS.  It is based on [this one](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QgMQeLymAdU) My thanks to Kevin Powell for clearing up all my previous Gulp-related confusion, especially pertaining to differences between Gulp 3 and 4. Sometimes all you need is just a basic tool that gets the job done without a lot of extras and this definitely fit the bill.
